activity01.name: Brought reusable mug to coffee shop

activity03.name: Rode a bike or walked instead of driving

activity04.name: Used a reusable cloth instead of paper towel or napkin

activity05.name: Washed laundry on cold instead of warm or hot

activity07.name: Went one day without eating meat

activity08.name: Turned the water off while brushing teeth

activity09.name: Created a meal plan for the week to avoid food waste

activity10.name: Bought an item that you intend to keep for life

activity11.name: Bought sustainably-made or fair trade clothing or accessory

activity12.name: Repaired an item of clothing, shoes, or accessory instead of throwing away

activity13.name: Turned off all lights in home before leaving

activity14.name: Replaced light bulb with compact fluorescent bulb

activity15.name: Adjusted my thermostat to reduce energy usage

activity16.name: Took wire hangers back to dry cleaner instead of throwing away

activity17.name: Switched all bills to online bill pay

activity18.name: Donated or sold used clothing items, shoes, or accessories

activity19.name: Bought certified biodegradable poop bags for your dog

activity20.name: Bought produce from a local farmer

activity21.name: Washed laundry on cold instead of hot

activity22.name: Bought a plant for your home to naturally purify air

activity23.name: Used optoutprescreen.com to opt out of mailed credit card offers

activity24.name: Ate at a restaurant that uses local ingredients or supports local farmers

activity25.name: Brought my own container to take home leftovers

activity26.name: Took trip to recycling center with items that can't be curb-side recycled

activity27.name: Bought food in bulk instead of pre-packaged

activity29.name: Checked out a book at the library

activity30.name: Bought bar soap to replace liquid soap

activity31.name: Replaced plastic razor and cartridges with safety razor and blades

activity32.name: Took public transportation for a day

activity33.name: Planted a bee, butterfly, or bird friendly plant

activity34.name: Bought or make a compost bin for your household

activity35.name: Bought a gift from a local vendor instead of buying online

activity36.name: Researched local and national politicians stance on environmental issues before voting

activity37.name: Installed a half-flush in a toilet at home

activity38.name: Bought a bulk-sized container instead of normal size (and didn't waste it)

activity40.name: Try a pack of tree-free toilet paper (bamboo, sugar cane, etc.)
